title: tools/jdk: BUILD file not found on package path.
body_html:
While installing from source, I got this error

ERROR: Loading of target '//tools/jdk:SingleJar_deploy.jar' failed; build aborted: no such package 'tools/jdk': BUILD file not found on package path.
ERROR: Loading failed; build aborted

I already installed java8 as per bazel's instruction page.
body_text:
While installing from source, I got this error
ERROR: Loading of target '//tools/jdk:SingleJar_deploy.jar' failed; build aborted: no such package 'tools/jdk': BUILD file not found on package path.
ERROR: Loading failed; build aborted
I already installed java8 as per bazel's instruction page.
body:
While installing from source, I got this error

`ERROR: Loading of target '//tools/jdk:SingleJar_deploy.jar' failed; build aborted: no such package 'tools/jdk': BUILD file not found on package path.`
`ERROR: Loading failed; build aborted`

I already installed java8 as per bazel's instruction page.
